alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 27 at 12:06PM MDT until October 28 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver, and Denver. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent water pipes from freezing, disconnect your hoses and drain any exposed water pipes.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
